name: Lily Necklace - Acid Yellow
description:
Inspired by a friend's artwork, this bright necklace is perfect for adding a pop of funky colour to your wardrobe!  Acid yellow glass beads are strung on a black leather cord, interspersed with grey + natural wood beads and brass hexagonal nuts.

You will receive a necklace comparable to the one shown in the photographs; however, beads may differ slightly, due to natural variations in materials.

Necklace details:

*Glass beads (yellow)

*Painted grey and natural wood beads

*Brass hexagonal nuts

*Brass hexagonal beads

*Leather cording

*Gold-plated findings; gun-metal lobster clasp

*Length: 14.5 inches

Handmade with love in Ottawa, Ontario by InDreams.

name: Constellation Dish - Sagittarius
description:
A delicate little ceramic dish, to hold rings, earrings, or tiny treasures.  Perfect for the person who has everything!

Tiny gold dots, painted by hand, show the astrological constellation Sagittarius (23 November - 21 December).

Alternate astrological signs available in separate listings.  (Full set pictured last.)

You will receive a dish similar to the one pictured, but minor variations may occur, as each constellation is hand-guilded.

Details:

*Hand-gilded
*Sealed, but not food safe
*Hand wash dish gently, if necessary
*Glossy finish
*Diameter: 3 inches
*Height: 1 inch

Made with love in Ottawa, Ontario by InDreams.

name: Amazonite and Cracked Quartz Necklace
description:
Such a stunner!  Perfect for elevating the basic white t-shirt to dressy status, this piece features aquamarine amazonite beads, cracked quartz beads, and brass heishi spacers, strung in a symmetrical, eye-catching pattern.  Perfect for making the everyday fancy!

You will receive a necklace comparable to the one shown in the photographs; however, beads will differ slightly, due to natural variations in material.

Necklace details:

*Amazonite beads

*Cracked-quartz beads

*Brass heishi beads

*14k gold vermeil chain

*14k gold-filled clasp and findings

*20-inch chain

Handmade with love in Ottawa, Ontario by InDreams.

name: Triangle Drops Earrings - Aluminum
description:
Lightweight and stunning, these earrings can be used to dress up your Little Black Dress, or as an everyday statement! Hollow-backed vintage aluminum triangles hang from sterling silver chain, forming a double-punch of geometrics that flatters every face type.

You will receive earrings comparable to the ones shown in the photographs; however, aluminum triangles may differ, due to natural variations in material.

Earring details:

*Silver-plated lever-back earring hooks

*Sterling silver chain

*Vintage aluminum triangles

*Drop length 2.5 inches (from hook)

name: Heishi Girls Necklace
description:
Classic yet edgy, this necklace is the perfect complement to a minimalist wardrobe.  Black glass heishi beads are paired with brass heishi beads and 14k gold-plated spacers and a brass-and-black faceted chain for a no-nonsense cool that's great for everyday wear.

You will receive a necklace comparable to the one shown in the photographs; however, beads may differ slightly, due to natural variations in materials.

*Black glass heishi beads

*Brass heishi discs

*22-inch chain

name: Brass Squares Necklace
description:
Brass square tube beads are spaced with vintage brass hexagonal beads, and strung on a black leather cord.  These beads will deepen in colour, with age, though the higher-polish tube beads will stay brighter longer.  Elegantly minimalistic, this piece can be worn on its own, or with the Aluminum Hex Necklace (pictured last).

You will receive a necklace comparable to the one shown in the photographs; however, beads will differ slightly, due to natural variations in materials.

Necklace details:

name: Snake Tribe Necklace
description:
African trading beads give this necklace its name: snake beads are so named because of their similarity in movement to snake vertebra.  These 'snake' beads are strung together in a tribal-influenced pattern, along with bone beads and a brass chevron drop, to create an intriguing, minimalist necklace.  Finished with brass heishi beads and a black-and-brass faceted chain, this necklace is perfect for bringing a subtle touch of tribal pattern to your wardrobe.

You will receive a necklace comparable to the one shown in the photographs; however, beads may differ slightly, due to natural variations in materials.

Necklace details:

*African trading 'snake' beads

*White bone beads

*Brass chevron drop

*Black powder-coated brass chain, faceted

*Length: 16 inches (end of chevron drop)

Handmade with love in Ottawa, Ontario by InDreams.

description:

Pairs perfectly with the Brass Squares Necklace (pictured last).

name: Diamond Drops Earrings
description:
These earrings are lightweight but still pack a punch!  Vintage faceted brass dangles from gold-plated ear hooks.  Amethyst, Labradorite, or Blue Apatite beads add a kick of colour, and offset the elongated brass diamonds perfectly.  Great for fun everyday wear, or for a night out on the town.

You will receive earrings comparable to the ones shown in the photographs; however, gemstones will differ, due to natural variations in material.

Earring details:

*18k gold-plated lever-back earring hooks

*18k gold-plated findings

*Choice of Amethyst, Labradorite, or Blue Apatite beads

*Drop length 3 inches (from hook)

Handmade with love in Ottawa, Ontario by InDreams

name: Dreamcatcher Necklace
description:
I was inspired to make this after thinking on the delicate, yet wild, nature of dreams.

A brass chevron drops from a gold vermeil chain, from which another drop of faceted brass hangs, below a raw Pyrite gemstone.  This one is absolutely stunning on.

Necklace details:

*Pyrite gemstone

*Brass chevron and faceted drop

*14k gold-filled findings

*14k gold-filled chain

*22' length (from clasp to bottom of faceted drop)

Handmade with love in Ottawa, Ontario by InDreams

name: Gem Bar Necklace in Garnet
description:
This minimalist design is perfect for adding something special to the everyday. Light and dainty semi-precious Garnet gemstones are married with 14k gold vermeil or sterling silver chain, and finished with 14k gold-fill or sterling silver findings.

Matching earrings (shown last) can be found in another listing.

You will receive a necklace comparable to the one shown in the photographs; however, gemstones will differ, due to natural variations in material.

Necklace details:

*Garnet beads

*14k gold-fill findings / Sterling silver findings

*14k gold vermeil chain / Sterling silver chain

*Chain 16 inches in length

Handmade with love in Ottawa, Ontario by InDreams.

name: Gem Bar Necklace in Labradorite
description:
This minimalist design is perfect for adding something special to the everyday. Light and dainty semi-precious Labradorite gemstones are married with 14k gold vermeil chain, and finished with 14k gold-fill findings.

You will receive a necklace comparable to the one shown in the photographs; however, gemstones will differ, due to natural variations in material.

Necklace details:

*Labradorite beads

*14k gold-fill findings

*14k gold vermeil chain

*Chain 16 inches in length

Handmade with love in Ottawa, Ontario by InDreams.

name: Neon Tribe Teal Vulcanite Necklace
description:
Vintage teal Vulcanite beads are strung together with brass heishi beads and off-white sequins for an upbeat, tribal-influenced look.  Finished with a delicate 14k gold vermeil chain and 18k gold-plated spacer beads.

You will receive a necklace comparable to the one shown in the photographs; however, beads will differ slightly, due to natural variations in vintage materials.

Necklace details:

*Vintage teal Vulcanite beads

*Vintage off-white sequins

*Brass heishi beads

*14k gold vermeil chain

*Gold-filled clasp

*18k gold-plated spacer beads

*20-inch chain

Handmade with love in Ottawa, Ontario by InDreams

name: Heishi Girls Triple Disk Earrings
description:
Brass heishi beads are married with semi-precious gemstones or Czech glass beads to create intriguing yet elegant earrings with a dainty dangle.  Unique enough to be worn to dress-up a look; light and versatile enough to wear everyday.

Choice of four colour types:  teal, light teal, rhodochrosite, or pyrite.  (Please note due to image constraints, only last three colour types are shown in images at left.)

Please note you will receive a pair of earrings similar to those shown in photographs, as the heishi beads vary slightly in width, and natural materials vary.

Earring details:

*Brass heishi beads

*Choice of bead colour: teal (Czech glass), light teal (Czech glass), rhodochrosite (pink), or pyrite (grey/gold)

*18k gold-plated findings

Handmade with love in Ottawa, Ontario by InDreams
